name: R2-condition-ver-status-for-R4B
title: Cross-version VS for R2.ConditionVerificationStatus for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-ver-status|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R2 to R4B.
